channel.title: github.com/atuttle/blog
channel.description: It's one thing to write code. It's another to humanize technology so it serves a purpose in people's lives. — Luke Wroblewski

item.title: "Fork Me on GitHub" Stickers
item.author: Adam Tuttle
item.description:
I have been going a little sticker-crazy lately, and I decided I wanted a "Fork Me" sticker, ala GitHub's Fork Me ribbons (pro-tip: use these retina-friendly ones instead) that are common for OSS developers to put onto their websites or their project websites. I couldn't find one anywhere, so I made one, and now you too can emblazon your favorite things with a "Fork Me" ribbon sticker.

Click here to get yours!
